summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Anukriti Prakashan e-commerce platform. All backend APIs (17/17) working perfectly with 100% success rate. Frontend UI fully functional with complete e-commerce flow from product browsing to order completion working seamlessly.
passed_tests: Backend API initialization and data seeding
Product catalog API (get all products, get single product)
Cart operations (add to cart, get cart, update quantity, remove items)
Admin product CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete)
Admin order management and status updates
Contact form submission and backend integration
Protected route authentication (cart, checkout, my-orders require login)
Complete e-commerce flow: browse → add to cart → checkout → order confirmation
Order history viewing in My Orders page
Responsive UI design with proper Hindi literature theme
